page.title: 10PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: THE PUBLIC HOUSES AROUND THIS AREA GET APPROXIMATELY 20_200 CUSTOMERS DURING THE DAY AND ABOUT 40_300 CUSTOMERS IN THE EVENING. MOST OF THE CUSTOMERS ARE LOCAL.THERE ARE FEW BEER GARDENS AND THE ALE SERVED HAS CHANGED CONSIDERABLY THROUGH THE YEARS. THE AGES OF THE PUBS VARY FROM 60 YEARS TO 500 YEARS OLD.SOME OF THE PUBLIC HOUSES HAVE BEEN MODERNISED. ALTHOUGH THE FAMILIES DO NOT OFTEN HELP IN THE PUBLIC HOUSES, PART TIME STAFF ARE USUALLY EMPLOYED.FOOD IS OFTEN SERVED IN THE PUBLIC HOUSES AND FOR ENTERTAINMENT THERE ARE DARTS, CRIBBAGE,AND FRUIT MACHINES. LARGE PARTIES ARE USUALLY ACCOMODATED WITHOUT BOOKINGS.ALTOGETHER THERE ARE 12 PUBLIC HOUSES IN THE AREA.
